results.content:
I am glad to inform that I passed the AWS solutions architect associate yesterday. I scored 84%.

Thanks so much Chandra for your wonderful course!!

This is THE BEST one stop course. Instructor explains each topic in great details, it helps to understand the scenario first then introduces concepts followed by demo. Eventually we get the knowledge and experience. Responses to questions on lab/lecture are near real time.

Apart from academic learning, I was able to bridge the gaps through study group a unique interactive by Chandra. This forum gives support and knowledge sharing platform.

Your approach towards Cloud architect has really motivated me and am looking forward to continue the journey and take it to next level.

Thanks
Pramod

results.content: I am happy to announce that I successfully passed the AWS SAA exam. Could not have been possible without this course. This course is the best I found over Udemy (as I pursued other courses as well). Chandra's approach taken to educate about AWS SAA is very structured and logical and has the right level of details with good questionnaire which was pretty close to the actual exam. I recommend the students to complete the part 1&2 along with the exam module as well which is more crisp and pretty similar to the real exam. Thank you very much Chandra for helping me pass the exam through these courses.

results.content: Another good course from Chandra, following on from part 1. Again, there is plenty of detail and background into why things are the way they are and how they work, which gives a good grounding into a solid understanding.  Missing a couple of big services such as Elastic Beanstalk and API Gateway but once these are in, there's no faulting it.
results.content_html: Another good course from Chandra, following on from part 1. Again, there is plenty of detail and background into why things are the way they are and how they work, which gives a good grounding into a solid understanding. Missing a couple of big services such as Elastic Beanstalk and API Gateway but once these are in, there's no faulting it.

results.content: Thanks a lot Chandra for the awesome AWS certification courses. I had no knowledge of AWS when I bought your courses back in late 2019. After 2-3 months of rigorous preparation,  I mustered the courage and took the test(SAA-C01) last week(03/09/20) and scored 940/1000. All credit goes to you. I appreciate the quickness and frequency at which you update your courses to keep up with what's happening on the AWS side and the clarity and simplicity in all your presentations/videos. Without the courses, I think, it would have taken me more time to prepare and appear for the test. Thank you not just for the courses and the score but also for making me feel like an expert in most of the AWS services and best practices.
